long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "Introducing YouTube Ad Muter, your ultimate solution for uninterrupted video viewing on YouTube! This innovative Chrome extension automatically detects and mutes ads during YouTube videos, providing you with a seamless and enjoyable viewing experience. Not only does it silence ads, but it also automatically skips them when possible, saving you time and frustration. With YouTube Ad Muter, say goodbye to annoying interruptions and hello to uninterrupted entertainment!"
